verses.verse: Now these are the names <WH8034> of the tribes: <WH7626> From the north <WH6828> end, <WH7097> beside <WH3027> the way <WH1870> of Hethlon <WH2855> to the entrance <WH935> of Hamath, <WH2574> Hazar Enan <WH2704> at the border <WH1366> of Damascus, <WH1834> northward <WH6828> beside <WH3027> Hamath, <WH2574> (and they shall have their sides <WH6285> east <WH6921> and west <WH3220>), Dan, <WH1835> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Dan, <WH1835> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Asher, <WH836> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Asher, <WH836> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> even to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Naphtali, <WH5321> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Naphtali, <WH5321> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Manasseh, <WH4519> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Manasseh, <WH4519> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Ephraim, <WH669> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Ephraim, <WH669> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> even to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Reuben, <WH7205> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Reuben, <WH7205> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Judah, <WH3063> one portion. <WH259>

By the border <WH1366> of Judah, <WH3063> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> shall be the offering <WH8641> which you shall offer, <WH7311> twenty <WH505> - five thousand reeds in breadth, <WH7341> and in length <WH753> as one <WH259> of the portions, <WH2506> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side: <WH6285> and the sanctuary <WH4720> shall be in its midst. <WH8432>

The offering <WH8641> that you shall offer <WH7311> to Yahweh <WH3068> shall be twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> reeds in length, <WH753> and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth. <WH7341>

For these, <WH3548> even for the priests, shall be the holy <WH6944> offering: <WH8641> toward the north <WH6828> twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> in length, <WH3220> and toward the west ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth, <WH7341> and toward the east <WH6921> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth, <WH7341> and toward the south <WH5045> twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> in length: <WH753> and the sanctuary <WH4720> of Yahweh <WH3068> shall be in its midst. <WH8432>

It shall be for the priests <WH3548> who are sanctified <WH6942> of the sons <WH1121> of Zadok, <WH6659> who have kept <WH8104> my instruction, <WH4931> who didn't <WH8582> go astray when the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went astray, <WH8582> as the Levites <WH3881> went astray. <WH8582>
It shall be to them an offering <WH8642> from the offering <WH8641> of the land, <WH776> a thing most <WH6944> holy, <WH6944> by the border <WH1366> of the Levites. <WH3881>

Answerable <WH5980> to the border <WH1366> of the priests, <WH3548> the Levites <WH3881> shall have twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> in length, <WH753> and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth: <WH7341> all the length <WH753> shall be twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand, <WH505> and the breadth <WH7341> ten <WH6235> thousand. <WH505>
They shall sell <WH4376> none of it, <WH4171> nor exchange it, <WH7225> nor shall the first fruits of the land <WH776> be alienated; <WH5674> for it is holy <WH6944> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

The five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> that are left <WH3498> in the breadth, <WH7341> in front <WH6440> of the twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand, <WH505> shall be for common <WH2455> use, <WH5892> for the city, for dwelling <WH4186> and for suburbs; <WH4054> and the city <WH5892> shall be in its midst. <WH8432>

These shall be its measures: <WH4060> the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred, <WH3967> and the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred, <WH3967> and on the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred, <WH3967> and the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred. <WH3967>

The city <WH5892> shall have suburbs: <WH4054> toward the north <WH6828> two hundred <WH3967> fifty, <WH2572> and toward the south <WH5045> two hundred <WH3967> fifty, <WH2572> and toward the east <WH6921> two hundred <WH3967> fifty, <WH2572> and toward the west <WH3220> two hundred <WH3967> fifty. <WH2572>

The remainder <WH3498> in the length, <WH753> answerable <WH5980> to the holy <WH6944> offering, <WH8641> shall be ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> eastward, <WH6921> and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> westward; <WH3220> and it shall be answerable <WH5980> to the holy <WH6944> offering; <WH8641> and its increase <WH8393> shall be for food <WH3899> to those who labor <WH5647> in the city. <WH5892>
Those who labor <WH5647> in the city, <WH5892> out of all the tribes <WH7626> of Israel, <WH3478> shall cultivate it. <WH5647>

All the offering <WH8641> shall be twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> by twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand: <WH505> you shall offer <WH7311> the holy <WH6944> offering <WH8641> foursquare, <WH7243> with the possession <WH272> of the city. <WH5892>

The residue <WH3498> shall be for the prince, <WH5387> on the one side and on the other of the holy <WH6944> offering <WH8641> and of the possession <WH272> of the city; <WH5892> in front <WH6440> of the twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> of the offering <WH8641> toward the east <WH6921> border, <WH1366> and westward <WH3220> in front <WH6440> of the twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> toward the west <WH3220> border, <WH1366> answerable <WH5980> to the portions, <WH2506> it shall be for the prince: <WH5387> and the holy <WH6944> offering <WH8641> and the sanctuary <WH4720> of the house <WH1004> shall be in its midst. <WH8432>

Moreover from the possession <WH272> of the Levites, <WH3881> and from the possession <WH272> of the city, <WH5892> being in the midst <WH8432> of that which is the prince <WH5387>'s, between the border <WH1366> of Judah <WH3063> and the border <WH1366> of Benjamin, <WH1144> it shall be for the prince. <WH5387>
As for the rest <WH3499> of the tribes: <WH7626> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Benjamin, <WH1144> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Benjamin, <WH1144> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Simeon, <WH8095> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Simeon, <WH8095> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Issachar, <WH3485> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Issachar, <WH3485> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Zebulun, <WH2074> one portion. <WH259>
By the border <WH1366> of Zebulun, <WH2074> from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> to the west <WH3220> side, <WH6285> Gad, <WH1410> one portion. <WH259>

By the border <WH1366> of Gad, <WH1410> at the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> southward, <WH8486> the border <WH1366> shall be even from Tamar <WH8559> to the waters <WH4325> of Meribath <WH4808> Kadesh, <WH6946> to the brook <WH5158> of Egypt, <WH1419> to the great sea. <WH3220>

This is the land <WH776> which you shall divide <WH5307> by lot to the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> for inheritance, <WH5159> and these are their several portions, <WH4256> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
These are the exits <WH8444> of the city: <WH5892> On the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds by measure; <WH4060>

and the gates <WH8179> of the city <WH5892> shall be after the names <WH8034> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel, <WH3478> three <WH7969> gates <WH8179> northward: <WH6828> the gate <WH8179> of Reuben, <WH7205> one; <WH259> the gate <WH8179> of Judah, <WH3063> one; <WH259> the gate <WH8179> of Levi, <WH3878> one. <WH259>

At the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds, <WH7969> and three gates: <WH8179> even the gate <WH8179> of Joseph, <WH3130> one; <WH259> the gate <WH8179> of Benjamin, <WH1144> one; <WH259> the gate <WH8179> of Dan, <WH1835> one. <WH259>

At the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds by measure, <WH4060> and three <WH7969> gates: <WH8179> the gate <WH8179> of Simeon, <WH8095> one; <WH259> the gate <WH8179> of Issachar, <WH3485> one; <WH259> the gate <WH8179> of Zebulun, <WH2074> one. <WH259>

At the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds, <WH7969> with their three gates: <WH8179> the gate <WH8179> of Gad, <WH1410> one; <WH259> the gate <WH8179> of Asher, <WH836> one; <WH259> the gate <WH8179> of Naphtali, <WH5321> one. <WH259>
It shall be eighteen <WH8083> thousand <WH505> reeds around: <WH5439> and the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> from that day <WH3117> shall be, <WH3074> Yahweh is there.
